title: Book a National Driver Offender Retraining Scheme course

details.description: Book a National Driver Offender Retraining Scheme course
details.more_information:
You can only take a National Driver Offender Retraining Scheme course if you’ve got a letter inviting you to take a course.

You’ll need your driving licence number to log in and see availability online.

There are several different courses under the scheme. Check the letter you got to find out what course you can take.

As well as course availability you can see prices, but this is just a guideline - the course provider sets the final price. Contact them to book and pay for a course.
details.introduction: If you’ve been invited to take a National Driver Offender Retraining Scheme course, you can search course availability online. You’ll then have to book directly with the course provider
details.will_continue_on: the National Driver Offender Retraining Scheme website

details.description: Includes disqualification, penalty points, vehicle recalls and registering boats

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
When you can get disqualified from driving, disqualified until test pass or extended test pass, applying to reduce your disqualification period, alcohol-related offences
You could be imprisoned, banned from driving and face a fine if you're found guilty of drink driving
